title: [FSX] [P3D] [P3Dv2] Opus Software OpusFSI v 4.50.2
description:
[FSXP3DP3Dv2]Opus Software OpusFSI v4.50.2

Opus Software OpusFSI (pre-cracked). 

Works well with FSX, P3D (every version up to 2.5). Not so sure with FSX Steam Edition.


A little help for thous who have the problem with high level winds or more exact not having them at all:

- You need to set your destination and cruise altitude in "Weather Options"

- Be sure that have checked "Download GRIB Forecast Data" in "Weather Options" ---> "Weather Download Options", and "Adjust Options Automatically" in "Weather Options".

Tested and working 100% in P3Dv2

Solved the previous problem of cameras. You need now the last version of FSUIPC
